author: Yechiel Orgel
content:
Dear Andreas,  
My name is Yechiel and I work on the Affiliate Marketing team at B&H Photo. I’ve worked with hundreds of photographers and artists both amateur and pro, and helped them transform their passion into revenue. I had a chance to review your site in detail. Great Site! I believe that your site would be a great fit for our Affiliate Program.

For over 35 years, B&H has been a leader in providing products and services to the professional photography and video industries. We have a national and international presence through our award winning website with over 200,000 visitors a day. I would like to propose a partnership between B&H Photo and manessinger.com. It would involve some type of promotion (banners, links, virtual store, etc.) on your site.
Here are a few reasons why thousands have joined our Affiliate Program:
1. They turned their traffic into steady monthly revenue.
2. Top Performing B&H Affiliates earn thousands of dollars a month.
3. Average order values well above most affiliate programs - averaging over $500.
4. Commission payouts ranging from 2% - 8%.
5. Affiliates have access 24x7 to track all account activity including sales and orders.
6. Every B&H affiliate is assigned a dedicated relationship manager to help you drive revenue and be an active partner in your success

About B&H
1. Since 1973, B&H has built its reputation on honesty, integrity, fair pricing, and superb customer service.
2. We are the Professional Source for photo, video, pro-audio, computer, and home electronics products
3. We carry over 250,000 products
4. Consumer Reports rated B&H a top 5 Electronic Retailer in 2008
5. B&H has been a winner of the BizRate Circle of Excellence Platinum Award for 7 Consecutive years


To learn more about our Affiliate Program:  http://www.bhphotovideo.com/find/affiliates.jsp

To view BHphotovideo.com: http://www.bhphotovideo.com/

I am confident that we can add value to each other’s sites. Please feel free to contact me with any questions regarding our affiliate program. 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
